Experience

Undergraduate Research

REU Program, USC SURE
Summer 2021

Project Report

  • During the Summer of 2021 I participated in a summer REU at (remotely) the University of Southen California Institute for Creative Technologies (USC-ICT).

  • I worked under Professor Mohammad Soleymani in the Intelligent Human Perception Lab.

  • My project involved using deep learning to assess psychomotor retardation from audiovisual data of clinical interviews. Psychomotor retardation is a symptom of multiple psychiatric disorders, most commonly major depresive disorder.

  • Further details can be found in the project report above.

Undergraduate Research

UCSB ECE 196
Winter Quarter 2021

Project Report ITC Paper

  • During winter quarter of 2021 I participated in an independent research project at (remotely) the University California, Santa Barbara.

  • I worked under Professor B.S. Manjunath and Professor Yogananda Isukapalli.

  • My project explored edge machine learning for face detection using the MAX78000, a low-power micorcontroller that uses a CNN accelerator.

  • Further details can be found in the project report above.

  • I submitted this project as an undergraduate paper (see above) to ITC and will be presenting it in October 2021.

Embedded Software Intern

Brain Corp
Summer 2020

  • During the summer of 2020 I worked as an embedded software intern with the firmware team at Brain Corp in San Diego, CA.

  • My project was to create a Linux application in C++ to perform firmware downloads of a low-level motor controller (for autonomous floor scrubbing robots) over CAN bus (socketCAN) and was part of a larger effort to update firmware over the air.

  • This involved reverse engineering an existing Windows based firmware download system provided by the vendor of the motor controller by sniffing CAN packets and understanding the details of the download protocol.

Software Intern

FLIR Systems
Summer 2019

  • During the summer of 2019 I worked as a software intern with the security team at FLIR Systems in Goleta, CA.

  • I worked on several tasks during my internship that involved writing bash scripts for running diagnostics, debugging, and configuring thermal cameras.

  • I also built a python GUI from scratch to help manufacturing technicians with the flashing and calibration procedure for radars
